Message:
My second journey to
the east was a success.
I’ll have great news for
everyone when I get back!

The Armed Forces said
they’d take in the people
of our village in one of
their bases in the east!

Supplying food for
a village of our size
wouldn’t be a problem,
so as long as
we’re okay with it,
they’ll let us stay there!

It’ll be sad to leave our home,
but now there’ll be no need to
consider things like lowering
the number of mouths to feed!

But, when I entered the village,
it was eerily silent.

Timidly knocking on
the village chief’s door,
the chief’s grandchild
appeared from inside.

The grim foreboding I’d felt
quickly transferred to the letter
the child handed to me.
